title: One Direction's Liam Payne exhales smoke during recording session with Juicy J
title_page: One Direction's Liam Payne exhales smoke during recording session with Juicy J | Daily Mail Online
text:
Liam Payne has been filmed exhaling smoke during a recording session with cannabis-loving rap artist Juicy J.
The One Direction star, who's currently on hiatus from the boyband, was captured puffing on an unknown cigarette, prompting loyal fans to ask if it was marijuana since he publicly vowed to quit smoking in December 2015.
While there's no evidence to suggest he was smoking anything other than tobacco, a source for The Sun newspaper believed the One Direction popstar was relaxing on his clean cut reputation during his break to record solo material.
Scroll down for video
Smoking: Liam Payne puffed out a ball of smoke as he's filmed during a recording session with American rap artist Juicy J this weekend
The video was shot by Juicy J and shared on his Snapchat on Saturday, and shows the pop singer releasing a ball of smoke from his mouth as he says, 'What's up?' to the camera.
Appearing to confirm that Liam plans to go solo, the video was set to the sound of Juicy J rapping: 'We are here making hits man, hits on top of hits. Say what up? We're making hits man, we're making hits.'
Juicy J also shared pictures of his weed stash, lighters and other paraphernalia in another clip from his photo-sharing app.
A source also told the newspaper: 'Even though there’s no proof Liam was smoking any of the cannabis, it doesn’t look great on camera.
Given up: The One Direction star vowed to give up smoking cigarettes for 2016
'He has millions of young fans around the world. Hanging around with someone openly taking drugs could be damaging for his reputation.'
The source added: 'Perhaps now 1D are going on an extended break he feels he doesn’t have to be quite so careful with his image.'
MailOnline has contacted a representative for Liam Payne for comment.
Fans of the 22-year-old were quick to ask if Liam was partaking in weed-smoking because Juicy J's reputation for using cannabis in the music studio is evident on his Instagram account.
Worried: One concerned 1D fan warned Liam that weed was a bad thing
Concerned: Another wrote in capitals to emphasise her concern on Twitter
Asking the question: Social media fans were quick to jump to conclusions
Betrayal: Liam said his New Year's resolution was to quit smoking
Association: Juicy J has made his love of cannabis clear on social media
New friends: Liam, here this weekend, has been hanging out with Juicy J (left) since February 2015
'i REALLLYY hope liam wasnt smoking weed that is a leading drug stupid head @Real_Liam_Payne' said one concerned fan.
Another protective fan added: '@Real_Liam_Payne WERE YOU SMOKING WEED IN THAT VIDEO!!?!?!?!'
While one other said: '@Real_Liam_Payne can you collaborate with someone else? You can do better than 'smoke dat weed'
Some of One Direction's loyal fanbase were disappointed in Liam because he vowed to quit his cigarette smoking habit in December as a New Year's resolution for 2016.
Bad habit: Liam's fans pleased with him to give up the bad habit in 2015 when he was pictured smoking on a private plane
He told People in December: 'I'm going to try and give up smoking, which is hard, but I do want to. I want to. It's about time. Need to grow up now.'
Liam was pictured with Juicy J and another friend on Instagram the same night, having reunited to make more more solo material.
'In the studio with liam #mustbenice,' said one of the posts, as Juicy confirmed that they were working together again.
The US artist previously told MTV News about their sessions on the Grammys red carpet in February 2015, explaining: 'We got some stuff we're cooking up.
'[He's] in Australia; we are going to get back in the studio and work on some more. We did about seven records that night.
'That guy is super talented, super talented, you know what I'm saying? And so we are definitely working on a lot of different things.'
